/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees, the blue of the sky, and the varied hues of the buildings creating a visually appealing palette.
